lead_paragraph: An article last Sunday about the golf history of Royal Birkdale, home to this year’s British Open, misstated the number of players who have won that tournament and the United States Open in the same year. It is six, not four. (In addition to Lee Trevino, Bobby Jones, Ben Hogan and Gene Sarazen, Tom Watson and Tiger Woods also accomplished the feat.).
